title: Fps Issues
body:
So I haven't played league for a while, to be exact, my last game was on the 12th of November, at which point I had already FPS issues, combining this with some important tests and all that coming up caused me to stop playing league for a bit.
So I decided to play the game again today, but the moment I joined in I noticed that the FPS drops were even worse than before, and more frequently.
At the moment I keep dropping to ~30 FPS every 3-5 seconds, which kind of makes the game unplayable.

Seeing as League is the only game that seems to be lagging for me I doubt it's a PC problem but here are my PC specs anyway;
http://prntscr.com/hqnnvs

I have tried turning settings down while in the game, which didn't work.
The like, event map thing doesn't seem to be the problem either.

Thanks in advance ^^

replies.body: It would be worth disabling snowdown assets via ingame-options to see if that may be causing your PC some stress.  A few operating systems have also had updates recently, so you may need to update drivers which the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide can assist with.

I was having a similar issue where my frames would dramatically drop everytime I moved my mouse. Tried everything (Changing settings, updated drivers, that sorta thing) but nothing seemed to change. Then I tried running league as administrator and that seemed to do the trick, so maybe give that a try?
Did you played today URF? If yeah that could be a reason for the lags today, a new map with many VFX and many spell casts could cause your performance.
